item.title: Master command? wtf
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Why don’t you just add it after all this (copied right from your commands file):

[code=java]package server.game.players.packets;

import server.Config;
import server.Connection;
import server.Server;
import server.game.players.Client;
import server.game.players.PacketType;
import server.game.players.PlayerHandler;
//import org.runetoplist.;
import core.util.;

public class Commands implements PacketType {
public static String authcode;
public boolean resetAnim = false;

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
            String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
            if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG) {
                    Misc.println(c.playerName + " playerCommand: " + playerCommand);
            }
            if (playerCommand.startsWith("/") && playerCommand.length() > 1) {
                    if (c.clanId >= 0) {
                            System.out.println(playerCommand);
                            playerCommand = playerCommand.substring(1);
                            Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, playerCommand, c.clanId);
                    } else {
                            if (c.clanId != -1)
                                    c.clanId = -1;
                            c.sendMessage("You're not in a clan!");
                    }
                    return;
            }
            if (c.playerRights >= 0) {[/code]

I also suggest you make your commands look similar to what was done in this:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/348200-adding-custom-ranks.html

Read full topic
